fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: Eurogroup of animals, Stop the trucks, Positive list campaign, Animal welfare platform
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: “Djurskyddet Sverige/Animal Protection Sweden” is one of the largest animal welfare NGOs in Sweden. We are a non-profit organization that has existed for over 100 years. Our vision is a society where humans show respect and compassion for all animals. We aim for all animals to be treated well, regardless if they live in the wild, are kept as pets or are bred to be food.
